The game is very fun but very shit in the same time. I would like to give Pros and Cons for those that read the reviews before getting the game for free/prime upgrade (the pros and cons are on prime)
Pros:
-you can find very chill people (depending on skill group)
-usually if you do mistakes people won't curse you and leak your IP mid-match
-The skins are expensive af so the kid that brags about owning everything still needs to use 7Launcher for skins
Cons:
-on wingman at silver ranks you will meet many russian kids asking: –ì–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏—Ç—å –ø–æ-—Ä—É—Å—Å–∫–∏? (Speak Russian?) and bearly do anything
-russian kids are very toxic if you botch in early ranks (no rank-silver)
-if you get good in no rank or silver people will aim
Community server cons:
-full of hackers
Enjoy your time on cs (this review was based off the matches I had in 140+ hours)
